member.summary: Returns a string representing a written as hex code.

member.returns: representing written as hex code.

member.name: M:TAlex.WPF.Media.ColorUtilities.ParseColor(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a color to its equivalent.
member.param: A string containing a color to convert.
member.returns: A equivalent to the color contained in s.
member.exception: s is empty string or written in incorrect format.

member.name: M:TAlex.WPF.Media.ColorUtilities.TryParseColor(System.String,System.Windows.Media.Color@)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a color to its equivalent. A return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed.
member.param: The string representation of the color to convert.

When this method returns, contains the that is equivalent to the color value contained in s, if the conversion succeeded, or transporent color if the conversion failed. The conversion fails if the s parameter is null, is an empty string, or does not contain a valid string representation of a color. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if was converted successfully; otherwise, false.
